short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject the HiConversion tag into any site for trial and testing purposes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrated Testing, Personalization, and Analytics

* Signup at https://www.hiconversion.com/signup/
* Follow the simple instructions to install HiConversion on your site
* Install this extension to inject the tag temporarily

Fully integrated platform: personalization, testing, and analytics applications operating as a single solution to produce directly measurable results and accurate attributions.

Customer-powered methodology: insights for effective customer engagements, algorithms for adapting to visitor preferences in real time, integrated customer experience analytics for competitive advantage.

Easy to use modular solution: a one time simple app activation for the lifetime of visual, no IT needed, customer experience optimization - flexible licensing plans.
